concept.title: Send to Error Stage Option
concept.shortdesc: Any stage with an error handling property includes the Send to Error option. The Send to Error option passes the error record to the pipeline for error handling.

conbody.p: Send to Errorerror handling optionThe record is either discarded or saved to an error record file based on how the pipeline is configured. come back and reword this when we have additional ways to save error records.
